overview: Are Traasdahl is a serial entrepreneur in digital media; Start-ups founded by Mr. Traasdahl have generated more than $350 million in mobile and online revenue up from $0 when he started them. Are was formerly CEO and Founder of Thumbplay, a company he exited in 2008. Mr Traasdahl and his companies have been featured in 1000s of articles including Wall Street Journal, New York Times, Fortune, Business Week and on television.
